channel.title: Kaiju No. 8 on CoNime
channel.description: Recent content in Kaiju No. 8 on CoNime

item.title: Kaiju No. 8 Volume 13 Released on VIZ, Kafka Faces a New Threat
item.description: VIZ Media officially releases Kaiju No. 8 Volume 13, delivering intense action as Kafka faces a new threat from Kaiju No. 9 in Tachikawa City.

item.title: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 Reveals Teaser Trailer and Gen Narumi Visual
item.description: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 has released a teaser trailer and new character visual featuring Gen Narumi. Studio Production I.G returns to produce the anime with confirmed global streaming on Crunchyroll.
